alert.note: Alert for Kent; New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 8:34PM EDT until April 16 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern New Castle County in northern Delaware... Northeastern Kent County in central Delaware... Southwestern Atlantic County in southern New Jersey... Southern Cumberland County in southern New Jersey... Western Cape May County in southern New Jersey... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 834 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Woodland Beach, or 8 miles north of Dover, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Vineland, Dover, Millville, Cumberland, Smyrna, North Wildwood, Laurel Lake, Woodbine, Estell Manor, Cheswold, Avalon, Stone Harbor, Greenwich, Corbin City, Newport, Cape May Court House, Leesburg, Scotch Bonnet, Woodland Beach and Dorothy. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 5 and 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
